amendment.description: To require a study of establishment of mobilization station at Camp Ripley National Guard Training Center, Little Falls, Minnesota.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3165 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3165 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Coleman. (consideration: CR S5790; text: CR S5790) To require a study of establishment of mobilization station at Camp Ripley National Guard Training Center, Little Falls, Minnesota.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3165 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3165 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Coleman.
